com.brightcove.player.model

Class LengthVtt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.model.Length
      • com.brightcove.player.model.LengthVtt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LengthVtt
extends Length
    Provides the representation of varying forms of length measure per the WebVTT1 specification.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • LengthVtt

        public LengthVtt(java.lang.String expression)
        Initializes a Length object by parsing the given expression. For more information on valid parsing, visit https://www.w3.org/TR/webvtt1/#cue-timings-and-settings-parsing Examples:
        • 4.5%
        • -1
        • 0
        Parameters:
        expression - the string expression to parse
        See Also:
        https://www.w3.org/TR/webvtt1/#cue-settings

      • LengthVtt

        public LengthVtt(double value,
                 StyledElement.Unit unit)
        Initializes a Length object using the given numeric value and Unit specification.
        Parameters:
        value - the numeric value of the length
        unit - the units for the length value
